sys_ui_message.message: 1. Click on your profile picture on the top right of the screen on Workday and select **View Profile**. 2. Select **Actions** under your name on the left side of your screen. 3. Select **Benefits** and then the **Change Benefits** option. (You can also type Change Benefits in your search bar to access this task.) 4. Select the **Pension Additional Voluntary Contributions (ZA**) option. Insert the event date (NB: The event date should be the 1st of the following month) Click **Submit**. 5. On the same screen (as step 4), click **Open** under **Change Benefit Elections**. 6. Click **Letâ€™s Get Started**. 7. Under **Retirement and Pension Fund**, click **Manage**. 8. Select the Benefit Plan and click **Confirm and Continue**. 9. In Step 1, leave the Contribution (%) as is (6.5%) and click **Save**. 10. In Step 2, in the Contribution (%) section, insert your desired additional voluntary contribution % and click **Save**. 11. Click **Review and Sign** to view the summary of your benefit elections and ensure that all elections are correct prior to submitting. Then click **Submit**, followed by **Done**.
